thread.title: Joe Scarborough on Yates Firing: Trump Using The Word 'Betrayed' Is Frightening
thread.title_full: Joe Scarborough on Yates Firing: Trump Using The Word 'Betrayed' Is Frightening

title: Joe Scarborough on Yates Firing: Trump Using The Word 'Betrayed' Is Frightening
text:
Joe Scarborough on Yates Firing: Trump Using The Word 'Betrayed' Is Frightening | Posted By Tim Hains On Date January 31, 2017 
On Tuesday's 'Morning Joe' on MSNBC, the panel along with Jonathan Turley discuss President Trump firing Sally Yates, the acting attorney general, after she refused to defend his executive order on refugees. "Using the word betrayed on somebody is frightening," he said. "That is the word an autocrat would use." "That is frightening, chilling language."
